title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 36 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 36 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The transgression of the wicked saith within my heart, that there is no fear of God before his eyes.
lineList.cn: （耶和华的仆人大卫的诗，交与伶长）恶人的罪过，在他心里说，我眼中不怕神。

lineList.en: For he flattereth himself in his own eyes, until his iniquity be found to be hateful.
lineList.cn: 他自夸自媚，以为他的罪孽终不显露，不被恨恶。

lineList.en: The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit: he hath left off to be wise, and to do good.
lineList.cn: 他口中的言语，尽是罪孽诡诈。他与智慧善行，已经断绝。

lineList.en: He deviseth mischief upon his bed; he setteth himself in a way that is not good; he abhorreth not evil.
lineList.cn: 他在床上图谋罪孽，定意行不善的道，不憎恶恶事。

lineList.en: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你的慈爱，上及诸天。你的信实，达到穹苍。

lineList.en: Thy righteousness is like the great mountains; thy judgments are a great deep: O LORD, thou preservest man and beast.
lineList.cn: 你的公义，好像高山。你的判断，如同深渊。耶和华阿，人民牲畜，你都救护。

lineList.en: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你的慈爱，何其宝贵。世上投靠在你翅膀的荫下。

lineList.en: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures.
lineList.cn: 他们必因你殿里的肥甘，得以饱足。你也必叫他们喝你乐河的水

lineList.en: For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
lineList.cn: 因为在你那里，有生命的源头。在你的光中，我们必得见光

lineList.en: O continue thy lovingkindness unto them that know thee; and thy righteousness to the upright in heart.
lineList.cn: 愿你常施慈爱给认识你的人。常以公义待心里正直的人。

lineList.en: Let not the foot of pride come against me, and let not the hand of the wicked remove me.
lineList.cn: 不容骄傲人的脚踏我，不容凶恶人的手赶逐我。

lineList.en: There are the workers of iniquity fallen: they are cast down, and shall not be able to rise.
lineList.cn: 在那里作孽的人，已经仆倒。他们被推倒，不能再起来。
